commands.sbhelper.invalidCount: The maximum count cannot be negative
commands.sbhelper.success.setMaxCount: Set max display count of scoreboard sidebar to %s
options.scoreboard-helper.title: Scoreboard Helper Config
options.scoreboard-helper.max_show_count:
Control the number of player scores that can be displayed on the scoreboard sidebar each time.
Default: 15
options.scoreboard-helper.show_scoreboar:
Controls the show/hide of the scoreboard sidebar.
Default: ON
options.scoreboard-helper.show_sidebar_s:
Controls the show/hide of the players' score(red number) of the scoreboard sidebar.
Default: ON
options.scoreboard-helper.sidebar_positi:
Controls the position of the scoreboard sidebar.
Default: RIGHT
